entries.name: getopts(*args)
entries.desc: Substitution of getopts is possible as follows. Also see OptionParser#getopts.

entries.name: options()
entries.desc: Actual OptionParser object, automatically created if nonexistent.

entries.name: options=(opt)
entries.desc: Sets OptionParser object, when opt is false or nil, methods #options and #options= are undefined. Thus, there is no ways to access the OptionParser object via the receiver object.

entries.name: order!(&blk)
entries.desc: Parses self destructively in order and returns self containing the rest arguments left unparsed.

entries.name: parse!()
entries.desc: Parses self destructively and returns self containing the rest arguments left unparsed.

entries.name: permute!()
entries.desc: Parses self destructively in permutation mode and returns self containing the rest arguments left unparsed.
